forum.content:
Welcome use 14 newest apps which are using for iOS devices including iPhone, iPad and iPod!

Please key-in "hanchanglin" on iOS App Store to find your need useful apps.

Apps introduction:

1. Ultra-high Pixel Camera: It is an amazing camera app with many special image filters including Pencil, Paper, Rich Color....etc.

2. Dual WordPad: It is a useful text editing app. It can be used for editing, compare and check the article.

3. Two Way Translate: It is a convenient tool using communication with the foreigner or article two way translation check.

4. Voice Diary: It is a useful app. It can record your every day voice and typing text via date base calendar.

5. Thumb Browser: It is a very convenient and fast browser. You could use your thumb to drag the scrollbar object for visit assigned daily websites.

6. Language Translation: It is a very powerful language translation app. It has four google translate windows to translate your four articles at the same time.

7. Ultra Memo: It is an amazing memo app. Its operation is very easy to use and has voice recording to assist your important matter recording.

8. Dual Browser: It is a powerful web browser which is using for dual window browsing.

9. Pronunciation Practice: It is a high performance voice recorder for language speaking practice.

10. Photo Calendar: It is a very special album app which can save daily image by one calendar.

11. Timer Camera: It is one amazing selfie timer camera for taking picture by yourself.

12. One on One teaching machine: It is one high performance learning machine for voice recording application.

13. Send your location: It is very a very useful app which can display detail address and send where you are (address and map).

14. Photo Viewer: It is a very convenient app which can display two diagonally viewpoint to view photos.
forum.title: Welcome use iOS Apps for iPhone/iPad
